profile_positions.description:
•	Process Expert Accounting-to-Reporting in Closing and Consolidation
o	Effective management of the consolidation process and supporting systems technology (Hyperion Financial Management, Hyperion Tax, Hyperion Planning)
o	Manage metadata in the consolidation system to ensure proper usage based on Chart of Accounts and Accounting policies
o	Plan and coordinate changes and upgrades of system solutions with internal and external service partners 
o	Collaborate with process improvement manager to deliver design and technology solutions to support reporting processes
o	Guide business partners in the transition towards a more automated and end-to-end integrated accounting-to-reporting process
o	Design, test, and implement system solution for IFRS17 reporting in the consolidation system
o	Obtain and manage technology solution for European Single Electronic Format (ESEF) Reporting
o	Design and collaborate with Tax Team together and external consultants a system solution for IFRS17 and Pillar II Tax Reporting requirements
o	Create technology business requirement documents for new solutions
profile_positions.title: Senior Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Legal Entity Manager for Legal Entities
oCitibank Switzerland AG (Bank), APB23 Elected – Citi Private Bank
oCitibank NA, Switzerland Branch (Branch) – Corporate Investment Bank & Citi Private Bank
oCitiTrust Switzerland (Trust) – Citi Private Bank

Experienced in Reporting for
oFinancial and Regulatory Reports to US Federal Reserve System and Securities and Exchange Commission

Internal Controls & Governance
oCertified Monthly Internal Controls Framework over Financial Reporting
oIdentified and remediated referential data quality issues to enhance accuracy of financial and regulatory reporting
oPrepared annual statutory accounts for KPMG audits
oManaged and supported outsourcing processing teams in Philippines, India and Costa Rica 

Organization and process optimization
oDesigned and implemented “shadow” ledger to reduce manual intervention in local and US GAAP reporting 
oImplemented Standard Procure to Pay system in country to enable utilization of Global Standard Chart of Accounts for smooth transaction processing
oLed identification and remediation efforts on referential data for EMEA Private Bank Data to ensure standardized approach, resolution, and improved data quality 
oDesigned regional automated data sourcing for Trust business to ensure compliance with US Regulatory reporting requirements and eliminate manual intervention
oImplemented Global Issue Management Resolution process in country to escalate to appropriate teams and to reduce duplication of efforts 
oMigrated balance sheet proofing and implemented FFIEC-31 Balance Sheet, Income Statement and Supporting Schedules to service center to increase efficiency and effective in reporting and controls
oImplemented regional data reconciliation process between legal and management books to decrease fragmented understanding of numbers and increase operational efficiency
oLed in-country efforts on Regulatory Reporting Improvement Project to ensure local and US regulatory reporting alignment and compliance
profile_positions.title: Controller - Citi Private Bank, Assistant Vice President

profile_positions.description:
•	Supervisor of a team (6 people) handling Corporate Banking and Citi Private Bank –financial reporting for main banking units in Europe: Ireland, Germany and Switzerland on top of the branch network in central and northern Europe with focus on; 
o	Preparation and consolidation of U.S Regulatory Reporting obligations 

•	Internal Controls & Governance
o	Ensured adherence to functional Internal Controls over Financial Reporting
o	Ensured strong controls over Maker / Checkers, Reconciliations and attestations
o	Maintained strong controls over offshoring and effectiveness of outsourced controls

•	Organization and process optimization
o	Rolled-out EMEA wide standardized equity reconciliation process to decrease ambiguity and increase productivity
o	Simplified EMEA business unit reporting to increase efficiency in consolidation process
o	Eliminated manual financial data adjustments for Management Reporting, consolidated Balance Sheet and Income Statement reporting to decrease human intervention, increase efficiency, and effectiveness in overall reporting process
o	Implemented process based organization segregating corporate, regulatory and management reporting to dedicated divisions to increase efficiency in processing and reporting
o	Designed automated EMEA Cash Flow, FR2314 reporting process to eliminate utilization of manual worksheets
o	Implemented EMEA wide standardized system data hand-off reconciliation to increase efficiency in the process
o	Implemented EMEA enhanced Country Exposure Reporting requirements to increase transparency and accuracy in reporting
profile_positions.title: Financial Reporting Supervisor - Continental Europe, Assistant Vice President

profile_positions.description:
•	Deputy supervisor of a team handling Corporate Banking, Citi Private Bank and Consumer Bank–financial reporting for main banking units in: Finland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Austria, Germany and Switzerland with focus on;

o	Preparation and later on consolidation of U.S Regulatory Reporting obligations:
	Financial and Regulatory Reports to US Federal Reserve System
	Financial Reports to US Securities and Exchange Commission
	UK FSA Statutory Accounts preparation for specified countries
	Intercompany Reconciliation

•	Migration lead for offshoring of Financial Reporting processes from countries to Centre of Excellence
o	On-site migrations from Nordic countries: Finland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark
o	Remote migrations from Switzerland (Trust Business)

•	Internal Controls & Governance
o	Ensuring adherence to functional Internal Controls over Financial Reporting
o	Ensuring strong controls over Maker / Checkers, Reconciliations and attestations
o	Maintaining strong controls over offshoring and effectiveness of outsourced controls

•	Organization and process optimization
o	Implementation and maintenance of enhanced global reporting structure
o	Implementation of SMART graphical user interface
o	Implementation of consumer bank management reporting into SMART system
o	Implementation of continuity of business plans testing with Costa Rica center

•	Training 
o	Provided technical trainings to Country Controllers and CFO’s over Financial Reporting systems to increase understanding and optimized use of the systems
profile_positions.title: Deputy Financial Reporting Supervisor

profile_positions.description:

•	Responsible for assisting Country Controllers and CFO’s during the consolidation of month end reporting processes for the entities. 

•	Prepared and supported Head Office reporting for;
o	Financial and Regulatory Reports to US Federal Reserve System
o	Financial Reports to US Securities and Exchange Commission
o	Intercompany Reconciliation

•	Participation in systems related projects enhancing the Citi reporting framework
